title: Need help downloading League again keep getting c++ redistributable error
body: I've tried everything that is posted but nothing works and it doesnt help there is barely any one posting solutions, someone pls help me.

replies.body: This error usually occurs on new PCs or outdated Windows.  Your best bet would be to update Windows to the latest version to make sure it has all necessary products.  You can also manually download [Microsoft Visual C++ 2005 Redistributable Package](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=3387) as well!  That should get you fixed up!
